snippet: Of his tying goal with just seconds left in Game 5 of the Rangers-Capitals series, “I was just hacking and whacking,” Brad Richards said.
abstract: New York Rangers center Brad Richards scores game tying goal against Washington Capitals in the frantic final seconds of the third period of Game 5, sending game to overtime.
lead_paragraph: Of his tying goal with just seconds left in Game 5 of the Rangers-Capitals series, “I was just hacking and whacking,” Brad Richards said.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs - Brad Richards’ Big Goal for Rangers
headline.main: Persistence, Not Art, Pays Off for Richards
headline.print_headline: Persistence, Not Art, Pays Off For Richards
